member.name: T:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GeoPoint
member.summary: Represents point on the Earth surface with geographical coordinates

member.name: P:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GeoPoint.Longitude
member.summary: Longitude of the point, in degrees, from 0 to ±180, positive East, negative West. 0 is a point on prime meridian.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GeoPoint.Latitude
member.summary: Latitude of the point, in degrees, from +90 (North pole) to -90 (South Pole). 0 is a point on equator.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GeoPoint.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates new instance of and initializes it with longitude and latitude values.
member.param: Longitude of the point, in degrees, from 0 to ±180, positive East, negative West. 0 is a point on prime meridian.
Latitude of the point, in degrees, from +90 (North pole) to -90 (South Pole). 0 is a point on equator.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GeoPoint.GetDistanceTo(System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GeoPoint)
member.summary: Calculates the distance in meters to a reference

member.name: T:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GraphicsExtensions
member.summary: Set of useful graphics extensions

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GraphicsExtensions.DrawPolyline(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Pen,System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws polyline. This method is more optimized than default because it draws only visible segments of the line.
member.param: Array of points defining the polyline
Flag indicating the line is closed one (last point should be connected with first point)

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GraphicsExtensions.DrawGraphicsPath(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath,System.Drawing.Brush,System.Drawing.Pen)
member.summary: Draws graphics path, optionally with fill and/or outline

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GraphicsExtensions.Nearest(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Finds nearest points for a point with specified coordinates
member.param: Point to find nearest point for.
Array of points to select nearest one.
member.returns: Nearest point from the array closest to the specified one.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GraphicsExtensions.FindVisiblePartOfSegment(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Finds visible part of segment
member.returns: Visible part of segment, i.e. first and last points

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GraphicsExtensions.FindClipBoundsIntersections(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Finds intersections of a line segment with clip bounds
member.returns: Intersection points. Count can be from 0 to 2.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GraphicsExtensions.SegmentsIntersection(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Finds point of intersection of two segments
member.returns: Point of intersection of two segments, or null if no intersection

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GraphicsExtensions.VectorMult(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Multiplies two vectors defined by coordinates

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GraphicsExtensions.LineEquation(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Single@,System.Single@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Calculates constants of a line equation by two points lie on that line.
member.param: First point lies on the line
Second point lies on the line

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.MapControl.DrawTilePart(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Draws part of a tile. This method is needed to draw portion of a tile with highest zoom level if a tile with smallest zoom is not ready yet.
member.param: X-index of a tile portion to be drawn.
Y-index of a tile portion to be drawn.
Portion of a tile to be drawn, 2 means 1/2, 4 means 1/4 etc.

member.summary: Draws a tile on the map.

member.summary: Draws thumbnail frame and text instead of a tile.
member.param: Message to be displayed instead of the tile.
Flag indicating the message should be displayed with error color.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.MapControl.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Action)
member.summary: Does the draw action. The method is needed for repeating drawing because map is infinite in longitude.
member.param: Draw action to perform several times for all visible width of the map.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.MapControl.NormalizeTileNumber(System.Single)
member.summary: Normalizes tile number to fit value from 0 to FullMapSizeInTiles.
member.returns: Tile number in range from 0 to FullMapSizeInTiles.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.MapControl.MetersToPixels(System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the number of pixels per meter according to the reference latitude and zoom level.
member.param: Latitude for which the distance should be calculated
member.returns: Number of pixels representing one meter.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.MapControl.YardsToPixels(System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the number of pixels per yard according to the reference latitude and zoom level.
member.param: Latitude for which the distance should be calculated
member.returns: Number of pixels representing one yard.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.MapControl.Project(System.Windows.Forms.Maps.Common.GeoPoint)
member.summary: Gets projection of geographical coordinates onto the map.
member.returns: object representing projection of the specified geographical coordinates on the map.

member.summary: Converts geographical coordinates to tile indices with fractions.
member.returns: Point representing X/Y indices of the specified geographical coordinates in Slippy map scheme.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.MapControl.TileToWorldPos(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Converts tile indices to geographical coordinates.
member.returns: Point representing geographical coordinates.

Y-index of the tile to be requested.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.MapControl.ProcessRequests
member.summary: Background worker function. Processes tiles requests if requests pool is not empty, than stops execution until the pool gets a new image request. Breaks execution on disposing.

member.summary: Attribution text that will be displayed in bottom-right corner of the map. Can be null (no attribution text) or can contain html links for navigating with default system web browser.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Forms.WebTileServer.TileExpirationPeriod
member.summary: Tile expiration period.
member.remarks: Different tile servers have various tile usage policies, so do not set small values here to prevent loading same tiles from the server frequently. For example, for OpenStretMap tile expiration period should not be smaller than 7 days:
